title: Hex to Decimal
statement:
# Hexadecimal to Decimal

Write a program that converts a hexadecimal number to decimal.

## Problem Description

Given a hexadecimal string (using 0-9 and A-F), convert it to its decimal equivalent.

## Input Format

A single line containing a hexadecimal string (uppercase letters).

## Output Format

The decimal equivalent as an integer.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ length ≤ 15
- Valid hexadecimal characters only
